main event: On November 12, 1963, a witness observed a bright object in the sky while in Port Huron, Michigan, for 15 seconds.
interesting points: The object was observed at 1:30 AM in clear sky conditions., It appeared to be elongated in shape and bright white in color., The object made no sound during the sighting., The witness had checked the time on their watch during the observation., The object was described as having a pulsating bright light in the middle.
witness description: Deputy Sheriffs Baker and Clark along with three others.
